name: Calculate Hours for Architecture Drawing
action: <*ASSIGNVALUE(FDA Architecture Diagrams:[IF](<*ISSELECTED(FDA Implementation Methodology.Non-Standard Build Estimate)*>){<* Eval((8*<*VALUE(FDA Number of Architecture Diagrams (1-10))*>)+(<*VALUE(FDA Number of Reviews (add Asbuilts) (2-5))*>*<*VALUE(FDA Number of Architecture Diagrams (1-10))*>*0.25)) *>}{[IF]([AND](<*ISSELECTED(FDA Implementation Methodology.Standard Build Estimate)*>,<*ISSELECTED(FDA GES Location.None)*>)){<* Eval((8*<*VALUE(FDA Number of Architecture Diagrams (1-10))*>)+(<*VALUE(FDA Number of Reviews (add Asbuilts) (2-5))*>*<*VALUE(FDA Number of Architecture Diagrams (1-10))*>*0.25)) *>}{<* Eval(<* Eval((8*<*VALUE(FDA Number of Architecture Diagrams (1-10))*>)+(<*VALUE(FDA Number of Reviews (add Asbuilts) (2-5))*>*<*VALUE(FDA Number of Architecture Diagrams (1-10))*>*0.25)) *>*1.1) *>}[ENDIF]}[ENDIF])*>
